articles.description: Tries in rugby union can no longer be scored by grounding the ball against the post protector, World Rugby announced on Tuesday.
articles.title: World Rugby outlaws tries against post protector - Sport24
articles.content:
Tries in rugby union can no longer be scored by grounding the ball against the post protector, World Rugby announced on Tuesday.
The law change, which comes in with immediate effect, was approved by the global governing body's council on Tuesday.

articles.description: The number of confirmed Covid-19 cases in South Africa has increased by a massive 698 to 11 350, Health Minister Zweli Mkhize announced on Tuesday.
articles.title: South Africa's confirmed Covid-19 cases jump to 11 350 - IOL
articles.author: Sihle Mlambo
articles.content:
More than 90% of the new cases were recorded in the Western Cape and the Eastern Cape provinces with 484 and 148 new cases, respectively. 
This also means that the Eastern Cape, with 1 504 infections, now has more confirmed cases than KZN, which has 1 394.
